lenders.loan_because: Can. I do not have much but I have more than many in this world and if I can in any way make someones life better I will.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the opportunity travel to Rwanda while studying microfinance and have seen firsthand that microfinance works and the opportunities it provides entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Bethany & Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I want to help support my fellow human beings in living their dreams. As a small business owner, I know how important it can be to just get that little bit extra to make that dream a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: Three years ago my husband and I started a small artisan confections business with everything made by hand. We started with nothing. I was attending university at the same time and a close friend told me about Kiva. I was so excited that that there was a site devoted to helping people love their dreams! When we were first starting out we found Accion USA through Kiva and they helped us get over the financial hump and grow our business. I truly believe in sites like Kiva and micro loans in general. They really do make a difference.

lenders.name: SASsy
lenders.occupational_info: SASsy stands for "Social Action Social." We're a group of socially concious people based in Vancouver, Canada who meet once a month to discuss social and environmental issues and brainstorm actions to create positive change. Micro-finance was our discussion topic for March 2009 and joining KIVA is our positive action. Thanks for this opportunity and best of luck to all the entrepreneurs!

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I respect the Kiva model of micro loans to help finance entrepreneurs in less developed countries.  It works, and while each loan is small, taken together they add up to significant change for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and a school principal.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: It seems amazing that the amount of money I, a disabled graduate student and crafter, can afford to lend, can still help someone far away from me succeed in her dreams and work.
lenders.occupational_info: I observe the way individual people relate to each other in the different parts of society that I belong to, and I find the similarities in what seem to be very dissimilar groups. When I teach, I try to help my students learn that we are all human, and that we all have similar needs and goals, which may just look different on the surface.

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I help grocery stores serve their customers better.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I have spent a lot of my life living in Africa, Asia and now the Pacific and I meet so many people with brilliant ideas who need just a bit of help to take off
lenders.occupational_info: Helping radio stations get better at giving their listeners good information

lenders.name: Heinrich
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a very good way to fight and reduce poverty, to enable people to build their live in self-dermination, to fight and reduce violence and injustice which is often caused by unemployment and social inequality. It is also an amazing expirience to join a congregation and community which works on the same subject, has similar goals and has a nonprofit and unselfish character. Born in Germany with all the privileges as education, safety, stability, employment, insurance, and medical care which we took always for granted, I feel the obligation to support others which weren't that lucky, often by birth and fate, without personal failures and deeds.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is currently as a so called development worker for a German organization. I am working as an advisor at a Palestinian vocational school in Jerusalem. My profession is electrical engineering, but I am working since the late eighties mainly in development, aid and emergency projects in Africa and in the Middle East.

lenders.name: Mak
lenders.loan_because: what might be little to us can make a great impact in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Janne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help balance the huge financial inequality in the world. Of course, it doesn't change the systemic problems...
lenders.occupational_info:
I spend most of my working hours sitting in an office in front of a computer, following the performance of the larger computer systems I'm responsible for, giving e-mail advice to the users, planning improvements to the systems, meeting with my colleagues in order to talk about the plans and making sure our ideas about the possible improvements agree. I also follow Internet discussion on similar operations, in order to gain new insight to and information on how to make it all work better, to make it easier and more comfortable for the users of the system to use it. Some workdays are more intense, if there appears something that interrupts the smooth operation of the systems, or when we're doing upgrades or other improvements.

However, currently (in 2010) I'm on a leave from my work, working on my master's thesis. It's a common flaw in an IT professional to keep his studies on hold for years and years, but I really think that I've been hanging around the university for long enough.

lenders.name: Trevor/Ardachy
lenders.loan_because: I can and it seems a great way of helping those who want to help themselves, their families and their communities.

Amo esta posibilidad y se que el universo me premitira la perfecta realizacion de mi sueño para mi bien y el de todos los involucrados.
lenders.occupational_info: De Lunes  a Viernes trabajo como empleado administratico en un Colegio de la Comuna de Chiguayante, los fines de semana arriendo inflables y camas elasticas para cumpleaños, ademas estoy entrando en el comercio electronico, luego de conocer la ley de atracción, se que el universo nos permitirá lograr nuestros sueños.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for Panera Bread Company, a bakery cafe that provides a great atmosphere alongside soups, salads and sandwhiches. I'm also a student studying languages, cultures and communication

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Systemic poverty affects us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to help young people make sense of the current state of the World by understanding various perspectives and motivations in the subjects under the "social studies" umbrella (History, Geography, Political Science, Economics, Psychology, and Sociology).

lenders.name: Jean-Pierre

lenders.name: Dirk
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility as an informed and empowered people to take care of those less fortunate then ourselves. Breaking cycles of poverty is not only with in our means, but also our duty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional athlete

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelancer in medical and legal research.  I also work as a glass artist.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Atheists of the world unite!  Plus, helping others to help themselves.  And, microfinance just seems like a great idea.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because:
"I was naked and you gave me clothing, I was sick and you took care of me, I was in prison and you visited me."
 
Serving our Lord by serving others.
lenders.occupational_info: Work as a merchandiser/account manager for a large wholesale grocery distributor.

lenders.name: Eric Foster
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others!
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in houses and real estate for profit. I also loan money to others to invest in houses, or to a buy a house for their family to live in.

lenders.name: Ghostlobster
lenders.loan_because: I have been successful with my business and my life and feel very fortunate. I hope to help make it possible for other's who desire to start businesses to be successful, as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that repairs computers and sets up networks for small to medium businesses and for users of home computers, as well.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupation: PhD student and Executive Director, Tariro
lenders.loan_because: I am especially interested in loaning to women, as the education and economic empowerment of women is the key to lasting development, stability, and peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the co-founder and executive director of a grassroots organization working toward HIV prevention through educating young women and girls in Zimbabwe.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I am able

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I love the women of Mali!  I want to help women everywhere get into the marketplace and earn money for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom and volunteer.  Have traveled to Mali twice to help villagers build schools.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed!  I'm starting my own business and I want  to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm building a website about homeschooling and working from home.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Investor trying to make a difference in the current housing crisis.  I look for single family or multi-unit housing that can be refurbished into a place anyone will want to call home. Professional, retiree, or former homeowner can be confident that they will have quality housing with a Williams Management Group property.

lenders.name: Robin

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: It is so wonderful to see people doing so much with a little bit of help.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage beauty through textiles and embroidery. I do a lot of hand embroidery and love to see others do embroidery and weaving.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: hope is for everyone :)
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computers that support government services. I would like to be a writer and travel around the world. I'm working on it.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in the microfinance system and how it can empower people in developing nations to drastically improve their lives.

lenders.name: Adam LeMieux
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: it's the cool thing to do. Everyone's doing it. Give it a try!

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: By helping other people, I am  making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Dale

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals with disabilities to help educate about technologies available that can help them be more independent in their lives and more successful in their education.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it helps me to feel less helpless.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my daughter.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Who will help the widows and orphans and others in need? If not me, then who?
lenders.occupational_info: I was in the military for a time, but when I got out, I wanted to help others. So I have worked in local government, non-profit organizations, and work as a volunteer preparing meals for the homeless. Yes, even in America we have hungry people without homes.

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: a little can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student going into nursing.  I love being part of a team that helps people.  I hope that what I do makes an impact in someone else's life.  I assist nurses and doctors take care of very sick patients.  I help draw blood, do small procedures and stock supplies for the nurses and doctors to use.

lenders.name: Malina
lenders.loan_because: poverty sucks

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I'm excited to see my loans going to help budding entrepreneurs and improving the living conditions of individuals less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve problems and prevent problems from occurring.

lenders.loan_because: we want to help women entrepreneurs better themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Community Service

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I know people need a helping hand I am glad to do what I can.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide access to books and other library materials.

lenders.name: chrisdyansyah

lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer teacher in high school

lenders.occupation: artist and gardener, adventurer and sales

lenders.occupational_info: I was working in an organic vegetable garden, where  I maintained the garden, created art for the garden, and assisedt children and families in learning how to grow, harvest and cook their own food.  I want to continue on this path, but right now have no job :(  Andrejs is working for the outdoor camping store, REI.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a happier and better place.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I care about others in the world and their well being.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students learn by teaching them in a one-on-one environment.  I teach math, social studies, history, English, and science.

lenders.name: Joel

lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to young children whose parents want them to have a positive feeling about learning the language and an early start communicating and having fun using English.

lenders.name: Janys
lenders.occupation: Web design, photography and collaborative writing
lenders.loan_because: I have a little extra to share
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a nice mixture of things I like to do which help other people to promote their business interests and allow me to live a bit more comfortably with my own family.

lenders.name: Chetan
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people succeed in their endeavors. hope each one of the entrepreneurs success!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work very hard at my job and I try to spend as much time as I can with family and friends. My role at work is to bring people together to get things done-  I enjoy seeing our collective work succeed. 

I like music very much and play drums and the guitar.

lenders.name: James

lenders.occupational_info: I help people express their creativity to help them make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the work of entrepreneurs in countries where this may prove to be difficult - or impossible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to share the love of God with as many people as I can.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.  I feel disappointed that charity does not work over the longer term and this loan system feels that it will allow people to become self supporting and maintain their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: A financial adviser helps people to plan their future by making the best use of their money and assets.  Setting priorities and goals with clients.  Explaining how to use financial products to meet these goals.

lenders.loan_because: I want my business to be more productive
lenders.occupational_info: Just going to customer to consult them about home improvement

lenders.occupational_info: I am a hairdresser too and I do so want you to do well as I know it must be harder for you than it was for me.
